title: Web Developer (Consultant)
description: Worked with the Expressen Web Site. It is a full stack JavaScript application with a server side rendered vanilla JS front-end plus a Node.js (Express) backend. The team focused heavily on performance, compliance and UI improvements using A/B testing and data analytics. The team’s development philosophy was based on TDD and mob programming as best practices.

title: Front-End Developer (Consultant)
description: Was part of a migration project where a legacy platform and web client moved to newer technologies. I worked on a checkout client written in React as well as some surrounding services and also helped the team improve their Splunk monitoring.

title: Front-End Developer (Consultant)
description: This project centered around compliance, as the team worked on a micro-frontend React application responsible for customer verification. My role was to introduce TypeScript, improve unit testing plus test automation (Cypress) as well as monitoring (Splunk).

title: Front-End Developer (Consultant)
description: I continued with my previous work but as a consultant.

title: Consultant
description: This is the company where I am currently hired as an employee.

title: Front-End Developer (Employee)
description: At NetEnt I was a part of the Game Framework department, helping the Game teams with deliveries that they could use to build games upon. Several generations of HTML5 / JavaScript game engines/frameworks were being built and improved upon, including tooling around it. We developed those using ES5/ES6+ JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, GraphQL, HTML, CSS, etc.

title: Web Developer (Employee)
description: Initially hired as a trainee, I later became part of a Site team working with B2B operations against the Turkish market. Technologies were mainly C# and .NET on the back-end and TypeScript/JavaScript, Angular on the front-end.

title: Systems Developer (Thesis Worker)
description: Upon request I built a web survey system in Node.js / Meteor. The system was able to generate employee surveys, as well as analyze them and generate reports.

title: Teacher's Assistant (Employee)
description: Helped out with tutoring and grading assignments in various programming courses.
